aom.scripting.xs.xs

Class Rule

  • Object
    • Rule

  • public class Rule
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of XS commands concerning Rules. A rule is basically a function without return type or parameters that is automatically called again after a preset time has elapsed. A rule definition typically looks like this: 
    rule <my_rule_name>
   <active | inactive>
   [minInterval <int (in seconds)>]
   [maxInterval <int (in seconds)>]
   [group <my_group>]
   [runImmediately]
   [highFrequency]
   [priority <xx>]
{
        //rule body
}
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int cActivationTime
      Holds the activation time of the current rule in milliseconds.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void xsDisableRule(string ruleName)
      Disables the given rule.
      void xsDisableRuleGroup(string ruleGroupName)
      Disables all rules in the given rule group.

      Disables the current rule.
      void xsEnableRule(string ruleName)
      Enables the given rule.

      Enables all rule in the given rule group.

      Sets the max interval of the given rule.

      Sets the min interval of the given rule.
      void xsSetRuleMinIntervalSelf(int interval)
      Sets the min interval of the current rule.

      Sets the priority of the given rule.
